MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event AfterLabelEdit As LabelEditEventHandler

summary.span: 当用户编辑项的标签时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the label for an item is edited by the user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `AfterLabelEdit`当用户完成修改项的文本时发生此事件。The `AfterLabelEdit` event occurs when the user finishes modifying the text for an item. 用户为该项键入的新字符串将传递给事件，事件处理程序可以拒绝更改。The new string that the user types for the item is passed to the event, and the event handler can reject the change. 如果事件处理程序拒绝更改，则文本恢复为用户开始编辑该项之前的文本。If the event handler rejects the change, the text reverts to the text as it was before the user began editing the item. 为了 `AfterLabelEdit` 引发事件， 必须将控件的属性 设置为 `true` 。In order for the `AfterLabelEdit` event to be raised, the property of the control must be set to `true`. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event BeforeLabelEdit As LabelEditEventHandler

summary.span: 当用户开始编辑项的标签时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user starts editing the label of an item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `BeforeLabelEdit`当用户开始修改项的文本时发生该事件。The `BeforeLabelEdit` event occurs when the user starts modifying the text for an item. 如果事件处理程序取消此事件，则用户无法更改文本。If the event handler cancels this event, the user cannot change the text. 你可以使用此事件来阻止用户编辑控件中的特定项 。You can use this event to prevent the user from editing specific items in the control. 如果 将控件的属性 设置为，则 `false` 不会 `BeforeLabelEdit` 引发事件; 将自动拒绝所有用户尝试更改项标签。If the property of the control is set to `false`, the `BeforeLabelEdit` event is not raised; all user attempts to change item labels are automatically rejected. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Click As EventHandler

summary.span: 在单击 中的 时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a in a is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Click`事件将传递 给其事件处理程序。The `Click` event passes a to its event handler. 因此，它仅指示已发生单击。Therefore it only indicates that a click has occurred. 如果需要更具体的鼠标信息 (按钮、点击数、滚轮旋转或位置) ，请使用 事件。If you need more specific mouse information (button, number of clicks, wheel rotation, or location), use the event. 但是， 如果单击是由除鼠标之外的操作引起的，则不会引发事件，如按 enter 键。However, the event will not be raised if the click is caused by action other than that of the mouse, such as pressing the ENTER key. 双击由用户操作系统的鼠标设置确定。A double-click is determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system. 用户可以设置单击鼠标按钮之间的时间，该按钮应被视为双击而不是两次单击。The user can set the time between clicks of a mouse button that should be considered a double-click instead of two clicks. `Click`每次双击控件时都会引发该事件。The `Click` event is raised every time that a control is double-clicked. 例如，如果您具有控件的和事件的事件处理程序，则在 `Click` `Click` 双击该控件并调用这两个方法时，将引发和事件。For example, if you have event handlers for the `Click` and events of a control, the `Click` and events are raised when the control is double-clicked and both methods are called. 如果双击控件，而该控件不支持该 事件，则该 `Click` 事件可能引发了两次。If a control is double-clicked and that control does not support the event, the `Click` event might be raised two times. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary summary.span: 当用户单击 控件内的列标题时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user clicks a column header within the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 `ColumnClick` 属性设置为) 时，如果用户在控件中的项的详细信息视图中单击其中一个列标题，则会发生该事件 ( 。The `ColumnClick` event occurs when the user clicks one of the column headers in a details view of the items in a control (when the property is set to ). 此 `ColumnClick` 事件通常用于对中的项进行排序 ，并使用被单击的列作为要排序的列。The `ColumnClick` event is typically handled to sort the items in the , using the clicked column as the column to sort by. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 `ColumnReordered` 事件是一个可取消的事件，可通过处理事件并将[ColumnReorderedEventArgs](xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel)属性设置为来取消 `true` 。The `ColumnReordered` event is a cancelable event and can be canceled by handling the event and setting the [System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.Cancel](xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel) property to `true`. 但是，如果取消该事件，则的 将不会更改为 值。However, if the event is canceled, the of the will not change to the value. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `GiveFeedback`当启动拖放操作时，将引发事件。The `GiveFeedback` event is raised when a drag-and-drop operation is started. 通过使用 `GiveFeedback` 事件，拖动事件源可以修改鼠标指针的外观，以便在拖放操作过程中为用户提供视觉反馈。By using the `GiveFeedback` event, the source of a drag event can modify the appearance of the mouse pointer in order to give the user visual feedback during a drag-and-drop operation. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ItemActivate`当用户激活控件中的一个或多个项时发生此事件 。The `ItemActivate` event occurs when the user activates one or more items in the control. 用户可以通过单击或双击来激活项，具体取决于属性的值 ，或使用键盘。The user can activate an item with either a single-click or double-click, depending on the value of the property, or with the keyboard. 从事件的事件处理程序中 `ItemActivate` ，可以引用 或 属性来访问中选定项的集合， 以确定要激活的项。From within the event handler for the `ItemActivate` event, you can reference the or properties to access the collection of items selected in the to determine which items are being activated. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 键事件按以下顺序发生：Key events occur in the following order: `KeyDown` 若要仅在窗体级别处理键盘事件，而不允许控件接收键盘事件，请将 窗体的事件处理方法中的属性设置 为 `true` 。To handle keyboard events only at the form level and not enable controls to receive keyboard events, set the property in the form's event-handling method to `true`. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 键事件按以下顺序发生：Key events occur in the following order: `KeyPress` `KeyPress`非字符键不引发该事件; 但是，非字符键会引发 和 事件。The `KeyPress` event is not raised by non-character keys; however, the non-character keys do raise the and events. 使用 属性在运行时采样击键，并使用或修改一小部分击键。Use the property to sample keystrokes at run time and to consume or modify a subset of common keystrokes. 若要仅在窗体级别处理键盘事件，而不允许控件接收键盘事件，请将 窗体的事件处理方法中的属性设置 为 `true` 。To handle keyboard events only at the form level and not enable controls to receive keyboard events, set the property in the form's event-handling method to `true`. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 `Layout` 添加或移除子控件、当控件的边界发生更改时，以及当发生其他可能会影响控件布局的更改时，将发生此事件。The `Layout` event occurs when child controls are added or removed, when the bounds of the control changes, and when other changes occur that can affect the layout of the control. 可以通过使用和方法来禁止布局事件 。The layout event can be suppressed by using the and methods. 暂停布局使你可以对控件执行多个操作，而无需对每个更改执行布局。Suspending layout enables you to perform multiple actions on a control without having to perform a layout for each change. 例如，如果调整控件大小和移动控件，每个操作都将引发一个 `Layout` 事件。For example, if you resize and move a control, each operation would raise a `Layout` event. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

span.span: Occurs when the control is clicked by the mouse.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当指针位于形状上方时单击鼠标按钮通常会从控件引发以下系列事件：Clicking a mouse button when the pointer is over a shape typically raises the following series of events from the control: `MouseClick` 按用户操作系统的鼠标设置所确定，两次单击就会正常运行， 而不会生成事件而不是第二个 `MouseClick` 事件。Two clicks that occur close enough in time, as determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system, will generate an event instead of the second `MouseClick` event. > [!NOTE] > 事件是控件在逻辑上更高的级别事件。 events are logically higher-level events of a control. 它们通常由其他操作引发，例如当控件具有焦点时按 ENTER 键。They are often raised by other actions, such as pressing the ENTER key when the control has focus. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `StyleChanged` 添加或更改标志时发生此事件。The `StyleChanged` event occurs when flags have been added or changed. 如果编程修改或用户交互更改了控件样式，则会引发此事件。This event is raised if the control style is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 "键盘 (" 选项卡、"SHIFT + TAB") ，并通过调用 或 方法，或通过将 属性设置为当前窗体来更改焦点时，焦点事件将按以下顺序发生：When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), by calling the or methods, or by setting the property to the current form, focus events occur in the following order: `Validated` 使用鼠标或通过调用方法来更改焦点时 ，焦点事件会按以下顺序发生：When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the method, focus events occur in the following order: `Validated` 如果将 属性设置为 `false` ，则将 `Validated` 取消和事件。If the property is set to `false`, the and `Validated` events are suppressed. 如果在 事件委托中将的属性设置为，则会 `true` 禁止发生事件后通常会发生的所有事件 。If the property of the is set to `true` in the event delegate, all events that would usually occur after the event are suppressed. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
